articles.title: Kilauea shock: Was THIS the reason for 2018 Hawaii volcano eruption? - Express.co.uk
articles.description: THE spectacular Kilauea volcanic eruption of 2018, which resulted in the destruction of hundreds of homes, and the evacuation of thousands of people, may have been triggered in part by unusually high rainfall levels, a new study has suggested.
